Summary Note:
The RM met Diana Schmidt during a business conference in Berlin. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
With a career spanning nearly 43 years, Diana Schmidt has established herself as a key player in the industry.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Diana Schmidt is currently widowed. Her children are named Lorenz, Hoffmann and Charlotte.
Education Background:
In 1977, Diana graduated from Gymnasium zum Grauen Kloster with a secondary school diploma.
Diana completed her university studies at Bucerius Law School in 1981.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 43 years, Diana Schmidt brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1982, Diana Schmidt started working as a Family Office Manager at Commerzbank AG, marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to Dresdner Bank AG as a Investment Director, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1983 to 1985.
From 1987 till retirement, she served as a CFO at Dresdner Bank AG, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1510000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Munich, Cologne and Nuremberg, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
